segments.text: Can ’ t you remember the days when you had the hots for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You tried to seduce me . I fell for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , are you going to the concert tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am just thinking of it . Maybe I ’ ll go .
segments.speaker: S2
